title: (33500) Llanes - Calle Vicente Pedregal Galguera

Stop in the yellow box so the camera can see your number plate. Walk to the machine inside the area with your passport and bank card. English and other languages can be chosen there is a back option usually top left. Sun makes screen really hard to see.
Choose a space - but it may tell you it's taken, choose another. It wants passport number,  name,  post code and e-mail address (but couldn't take underscore) it knew our registration plate from the camera.

title: (33509) Llanes - 56 Calle la Tala
description: Free wide esplanade parking. No services or shade. Near another parking lot with discharge and water. They are different.

title: (33509) Llanes - 41 Aldea Pancar

title: (33509) Llanes - 10 LLN-1

Public restroom and a shower on the beach but closed during the off season (we were there in mid-February). I walk without a lot of season going by. excellent town and work of a Basque artist on the dock. Very beautiful coast of the walk.

title: (33509) Llanes - 11 La Arquera
description: Parking that can accommodate a large number of motorhomes 10 minutes walk from the city center! The road next door is very busy!

title: (33500) Llanes - s/n Avenida Carretera de Toro
title_short: (33500) Llanes - s/n Avenida Carretera de Toro
description: Private parking in a meadow near Toró beach. We arrived at 6:00 p.m. and there was no surveillance. You can stay overnight as long as the neighbors don't protest. There is no gauge limit. Very quiet place near Llanes.

title: (33509) Póo - 113 Póo
description: Drinking water fountain. Validated by the locals.

title: (33509) Llanes - 4 LLN-2
description: Parking on the side of a cider house but which belongs to the town hall and therefore you can park without problems. Less than 5 minutes walk from the Antilles beach and 15-20 minutes from the center of Llanes. Very quiet place to spend the night, although until 11pm there is noise from the cider house.

name: Camping Las Conchas
title: (33509) Camping Las Conchas
description: Llanes, AS-263. Las Conchas Campsite. Camping Les Coquilles in a privileged place, paths to celorio and nearby beaches. To recommend

title: (33596) San Roque del Acebal -
description: Old unused road, possibility to park 2 vans but be careful not to block the path. A bit of passage at night but it helps.

title: (33509) Llanes - 4A Calle Pereda
description: Hard to find a quiet corner in the area, they are not too van life friendly. We ended up stopping here. In the shade of plane trees, close to a busy street, quiet at night. No toilet, no trash, so plan what you need to keep the place clean... Relatively flat, but doesn't seem to be suitable for anything more than a van.

title: (33596) Llanes - LLN-2
description: Parking in a curve above the very beautiful Playa de Ballota. Relatively little traffic in the evening and almost none at night. There are no prohibition signs and we were able to stand for several nights with our camper unmolested. No rubbish bins or similar nearby (there are some at Playa), please take your rubbish with you and don't do your "business" in the ditch. Thanks !

title: (33596) Llanes - 115 Lugar Andrin
description: Fill up with water. Very easy with a canister.

title: (33596) Llanes - Camino Ballota
description: Small parking for 6 vehicles, the terrain is a bit irregular but suitable for when the parking below is complete, to spend a night it can be used

title: (33596) Llanes - LLN-2
description: Parking for 4 vans above the ballota beach. Peaceful place. And great views. With a couple of paths next to it for hiking. I was yesterday, the civilian did not come. It can only be used in winter since in the summer they work with some stones that prevent the passage (last photo)

title: (33596) Llanes - Camino Ballota
description: Accessible only in van, very steep dirt road, to avoid if rain, surf spot rendezvous. You can attempt in a large campervan but it's dangerous,  very large pot holes, don't attempt if raining.

title: (33595) Celorio - 224 Celoriu
description: It is a parking lot next to the monastery of San Salvador de Celorio. It does not have services. It's next to the beach.

title: (33595) Celorio - 1A Camino Central
description: Free parking, spacious and close to playa de Palombina, possibility of overnight. With toilets at the beach, bars and restaurants.

title: (33596) Andrín - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent free parking 150 meters from the beach, with views of the meadow and the mountains, to visit Andrin beach, an uneven area with no services, next to the town cemetery. In the beach area there is a beach bar with a bathroom and shower on the beach.

title: (33596) Llanes - Camino Playa
description: Going down the road to the beach you find a first fork and follow it to the right, you enter about 20 meters I begin a green environment of forest and shade, it is a dead-end road to be able to leave the van at the end of everything, there are hardly 50 meters and you can turn around.

title: (33596) Llanes - Camino Playa
description: Really great Playa Adrin parking lot for vans and motorhomes. Road a bit narrow but flat parking. Small restaurant probably open in summer. Not open for us in mid-September but we were able to eat on the terrace (tables and benches), there is above all a superb view 100m from the car park. Be careful, very narrow road. Possible vans and vans but not possible large motorhomes.

title: (33595) Celorio - 283 Celoriu
description: Parking near the beach surrounded by gazebos, quiet. toilets.

title: (33596) Llanes -

title: (33595) Balmori - Unnamed Road

title: (33597) Llanes - 67 Lugar Puertas

description:
Nice tap to fill a bottle.
Tasting very good!

description: Picnic area with two tables, two benches, fountain (currently not working) and good views. Parking 5 spaces next to it.

title: (33595) Niembru - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet area with tables and some shade. Ideal for the night

title: (33595) Niembru - 100A Calle Niembro
description:
Paid parking (€4), only during the day. We arrived with the van, a boy charged us at the entrance. It is a green, flat, easily accessible area.

It is right next to the entrance to the estuary, we easily went down with the paddle surf board.

Next door is a park with children's swings, garbage cans, including recycling, and at least 2 small recreational areas with tables.

The area is beautiful and quiet, several restaurants and the church of Niembro a 3-minute walk away.

Supermarket and gas station 5 minutes by car.

title: (33595) Niembru - 135A Calle Niembro
description: Small drinking fountain

title: (33595) Llanes - 200 Niembru
description: We slept in this "mirador" on the night of August 18, 2019 together with other vans. Very quiet place with incredible views of two bays found thanks to the map of the Spanish forum furgoperfecto. It is found by continuing beyond the parking lot indicated for the beach. I am inserting the commercial in September 2023 because with great surprise I saw that it does not appear on P4N. Not knowing if any bans have been placed in the meantime, I recommend checking. I hope it can be of help.

title: (33595) Niembru -
description: Large car park, great view, sea on one side and mountains on the other. Access to Tromibia beach (30min walk about 1.7km). No service, quiet, meadow. Narrow access in town (max. 2.4m) therefore probably only suitable for vans and not for mobile homes.

title: (33594) Posada de Llanes -
description: No services but good for a very quiet night, just disturbed by the children who come to train at the stadium which is just opposite. We are in the shade The stadium keeper tells us that there are a lot of activities on weekends and that it is not always possible to stop there

title: (33594) Bricia - 102 Aldea Bricia
description: Rest area with gas station. Large parking lots for trucks and motorhomes. You can wash the motorhome without problem, you can also sleep at night as it has plenty of parking spaces. There is a cafeteria with daily menu and a shop.

title: (33594) Llanes - 24 Aldea Bricia
description: Continuing from the first camper parking, there is a parking lot illuminated at night where ACs can be seen parked. Shims needed for leveling.

title: (33597) Vidiago - 25 Lugar Vidiago
description: Very nice picnic area a little away from the national road. attention narrow passage.

title: (33594) Llanes - Aldea Bricia
description: Gas station with source and services.

description: Flat parking, grass and gravel, next to the town, quiet.

title: (33594) Bricia - 43 Aldea Bricia
description: Drinking fountain without thread. Narrow access, no place to stop with the car.

title: (33594) Llanes - 16 Lugar Posada
description: Service station with good prices and an unbeatable deal. Very friends of AC, they even let us plug in for a moment to use the hairdryer. It has a rear parking.

title: (33594) Llanes - 2 Aldea Posada
description: Self-service laundry "La Colada"

title: (33594) Llanes - 96 AS-115
description: Parking place to easily access the services of the town of Posada. The laundry and the supermarket are three minutes away. Restaurants 5 minutes away.

title: (33598) Llanes -
description: Before camping La Paz ideal parking for a picnic.

title: (33598) Pendueles - 8 Los Ciervos
description: Rudimentary parking overlooking a pretty pebble beach. Rather vans/vans than large motorhomes. Parking possible for around ten vehicles if everyone parks correctly… Catering possible at the campsite (on site or to take away). Nice surf spot at low tide/mid-tide (sand at low tide).

title: (33594) Llanes - 1 AS-379
description: Do you want to get away from the bustle of the city and enjoy direct contact with nature? Helppark is just what you need. This caravan area is located in Llanes, Asturias, it has large green areas in its surroundings. In addition, it includes different services such as drinking water and emptying of gray and black water. Although its advantages do not end here, since it allows you to spend the night and has an electrical connection included in the reservation. Guarantee a place for your motorhome where it will be protected and video-monitored 24 hours a day. The urban center of Posada de Llanes is close to the car park and, in it, you can find everything from shops to restaurants and supermarkets to stock up. On the other hand, in its vicinity there are a variety of natural points of interest such as the beaches of Gulpiyuri, San Antolín or Barro. Do not waste any more time and make your reservation through the Helppark website to benefit from great offers and the cheapest prices. ONLY WEB RESERVATIONS

name: Camping La Paz
title: (33598) Camping La Paz
description: , 1 place Pendueles. Camping La Paz We spent one night with a motorhome. the campsite is very beautiful, it has two spaces: the forest and the beach. There are a lot of surfers but at night it is very calm. Recommended website. The entrance is very steep and for big bolumen you have to be careful. Helpful and very friendly staff. Also clean the bathrooms and the laundry area.

title: (33598) -
description: Abandoned crossroads. Good place to rest and eat since there is no one. Access made difficult by vegetation. You hear the highway

title: (33594) Llanes - 9 AS-379
description: Good place to spend the night, nothing special, but as it is a bit difficult to find a place to sleep in this area, a good alternative. Was calm and had no problems.

title: (33594) Llanes -
description: Under the highway, huge and flat parking lot, you can sleep. It does not have any service but there is a path to get to the beach on foot or by bike.

title: (33594) Llanes - AS-263
description: Free parking at the roadside and near the railway. Several spaces available. Easy access. Ideal for walking. Close to the beach, a river, forest and an old abandoned monastery that can be visited by appointment.

title: (33594) Llanes -
description: We have spent the afternoon of Saturday, August 10, without problems, in the parking lot at the top of the curve of the viewpoint. We asked at the bar and they told us that the only drawback would be the noise from the highway, but only the sound of the sea is heard. The views are its strong point

title: (33576) Rozacanal - AS-345
description: Extraordinary rest area next to the road that goes from Arenas de Cabrales to Alles, with almost no traffic, except at night. Incredible sunset and sunrise with views of the mountains of Juan Roble to the south and Cuera to the north, with Pica Peñamellera (the Asturian cervino to the east). There is water, tables, swings...

title: (33594) Naves de Llanes - Playa de San Antolín
title_short: (33594) Naves de Llanes - Playa de San Antolín

title: (33593) Llanes - 233 Calle Naves

title: (33598) Llanes - 31 Lugar Pendueles
description: drinking water fountain

title: (33594) Naves - 1 plaza Iyan
description: Nice place very quiet, ideal for a picnic in a van (too narrow for a motorhome...)

description: Salient on the road to go to the beaches of Buelna and Cobijero.

title: (33508) Llanes - Unnamed Road

The farmer went several times to see his animals and kindly greeted us. The place is clean of any passage, thank you for leaving it in the same state. No service but a fountain not far in the parking lot of the watchtower.

title: (33576) Caldabones -

title: () Llanes - LLN-16
description: Picnic area and Picos de Europa viewpoint. With benches and a fountain.

description: Esplanade at the foot of a little traveled mountain road. With beautiful views of the Picos de Europa and little traffic. Ideal for watching the sunset. Plenty of benches and tables, cows and ships in the area.

title: (33590) Tresgrandas - 69A Lugar Tresgrandas
description: Quiet parking with good views, we found it by chance, it is a bit steep to spend the night is fine, we were alone surrounded by the houses of the town.

description: Mier recreational area near arenas, the access is a bit narrow, paved and smooth parking, a water fountain and some tables

description: Laundry (self-service). Two fully automated washing machines and 1 dryer

Public water source in the town.
Parking next to the water fountain could be a bit difficult, but it all depends on what time you go.

name: Camping Naranjo de Bulnes
title: (33554) Camping Naranjo de Bulnes
description: Good place to camp if you don't have a reservation. Close to essential routes (Bulnes, Cares, etc). It is quiet, clean and with all the services. The town is a 10-minute walk away and has an area for tapas at night, a good atmosphere. Highly recommended. The bad thing is that they do not accept reservations and they do not usually pick up the phone. You have to show up there and cross your fingers.

title: (33554) Barrio Juansabeli, s/n - 1A Lugar Arenas
description: Gas station, 2 km from Arenas de Cabrales (Ruta del Cares), towards AS-114 Panes / N-621 Potes. Coffee, Hotel and Restaurant. Fill the water tanks with motorhome water. Water pipe next to the main road (free of charge) Cepsa and Repsol gas bottles. Gas bottle 2kms from Arena de Cabrales (Route des Soins), direction AS-114 Panes / N-621 Potes. Café, hotel and restaurant.

title: (33554) Asturias - 2 AS-114

title: (33554) Las Arenas - Lugar las Arenas, 214

description: GOES! Laundry Laundry service directly in the large parking lot of Las Arenas.

description: Just after the bridge, right into a large grassy area. Perfect for Ruta de Cares as the shuttle stop is 200m away.

title: (33554) Las Arenas - 10 AS-264
description: Wonderful softness for the night

title: (33576) Mildon - PA-3
description: Quiet spot on a winding road in the Pico's, breathtaking view, benches and mountain goats. 10 minutes from las arenas and an oasis of calm. Disfrutar!

title: (33507) Llanes - LLN-14
description: Alternative ample parking area for larger vehicles on side of road for Camin Encantau on busy days (weekends and holidays). Route is circular so makes little difference where you park.

title: (33592) Llanes - 357 Calle Nueva
description: Laundry, close to the road and easy to park

description: The only parking lot where there is 3G / 4G internet, if you go up to Poncebos there is no mobile coverage, the parking lot is small, there is a little hill, at night it is quiet, the civil guard Went up and down and no problem.

title: (33592) Nueva - 23A Lugar Nueva
description: It is not a quiet area is busy. It is broad.

description: Flat, ample area to park for the Camin Encantau, if parking at Venta de Pobre is difficult (weekends and holidays). As route is circular, it makes little difference.

title: (33598) Llanes - N-634
description:
Rest area near the beach of the
 Franca, 500 m.
drive through Franca it's the rest area on the right, if you use the coordinates it'll take you on narrow roads you don't need to take. stay on main rd
mind the big potholes towards the back.

title: (33592) Picones -
description: A beautiful clearing with a park bench. Direct access by car to the meadow from a road with little traffic. Very quiet place with the sound of water and birds singing. Perfect place for lunch or to rest!

title: (33592) Llanes - AS-340
description: Very spacious parking in a meadow for many motorhomes and completely flat. When I arrived nobody was open charging. A 1 km walk from a fine sand beach (beautiful) with a beach bar. No services and at the entrance there is a mini cardboard sign that says "from 9:30 pm to 10 am closed". Very calm.

title: (33592) Llanes - AS-340
description: Parking in front of a very beautiful beach. Only small campers since there is a very low natural bridge at the access.

name: Camping Playa de La Franca

description:
Forbidden for vehicles longer than 5 meters.
Deserted beach and sun. Everything is closed around. End of October

title: (33592) Llanes - AS-340
description: Very good access to park in the middle of nature. Accessible for any type of vehicle. At the end of the road there is a fence that leads to the cove of the caves. It is pretty quiet.

title: (33590) Playa de la Franca - 2 Lugar Playa de la Franca
title_short: (33590) Playa de la Franca - 2 Lugar Playa de la Franca
description: Parking next to the beach. With public toilets available, day and night. Unlike the first car park, it is possible to spend the night. There were several trucks and a car sleeping. Maybe not the place for CC, because parking space is small for them.

name: Camping Las Hortensias
title: (33590) Camping Las Hortensias
description: Camping Las Hortencias of 1st category with all services and walk to the beach. Very beautiful place.

title: (33507) Ardisana - Unnamed Road
description: Just 2 tables with benches with fabulous views.  No services.  Little space on side of track to park.  We didnt spend the night.  Only space for 1 small van to park.

title: (33554) Las Arenas - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador de Area Recreativa Invernales Vanu - small, quiet, very well-kept picnic area with a covered bench, to the right there is a small driveway that offers space for a car.

title: (33590) La Franca - 401A Barrio Mazo
description: Hotel Restaurant La Parra has a shower service for 2 euros. It is a large space with a shower tray, sink, mirror and plugs. When we arrived it was busy, we waited for us having a coffee and the girl came to let us know that it was ready. We shower together, space permits. It was clean.

title: (33590) Asturias - 207A Calle Peral
description: Cepsa gas station and restaurant with shower.

title: (33590) Noriega - 48 Calle la Carrera
description: In the center of the village, next to a football and basketball field, and close to the restaurant, there is an asphalt parking lot. Very quiet location.

title: (33591) Garaña -
description: Nice spot accessible only to vans because the road is very narrow. Quiet night, a few walkers or fishermen in the evening.

name: Camping Colombres
title: (33590) Camping Colombres
description: On the RD-3 road. Campsite Colombres. Very good campsite (1st category). Very large flat pitches, shaded. Very clean toilets with hot water all day. Cleaned very regularly. Games for children. Near Ocean and Mountain Peaks of Europe.

title: (33590) - 68 Calle Mediavilla
description: Day and night parking in the beautiful and quiet town of Noriega, dotted with numerous Indian houses as well as a medieval tower. The car park is located next to the church and the cemetery and on an esplanade. Beautiful views of the valley and the Sierra del Cuera. Right next to it there is a restaurant with a terrace to eat and have a drink, in addition, also next to it, the 9 km route of traditions starts on the sports court. highly recommended and for the whole family.

name: Camping Palacio De Garaña
title: (33591) Camping Palacio De Garaña
description: Garaña, 25 Lugar Garaña. Camping Palacio De Garaña

title: (33591) Garaña - 25 Lugar Garaña
description: Picnic area equipped with barbecues, rural tables with sidewalks, lighting, garbage. Parking for cars and cars. It is not allowed to stay overnight. Frequent GC visits. There is an unverified source that is potable water. Tranquility. Trails for walking and mountain biking. The famous Jesters, are close to go on foot (2 km approx). Nearby bar and campsite with small shop.

title: (33554) - AS-264
description: Large parking, 2 km from Poncebos. Gratuitous. Very spacious. Elevated on the road, in the middle of nature. Quiet. Used by the municipality of Poncebos to decongest the town. All services in Poncebos.

title: (33590) Ribadedeba - 109A Calle Peral
description: At the edge of the road not too noisy

title: (33579) - 2 Travesía de Panes
description: Parking at the start of a pretty walk along the river. we spent a quiet night there. fishermen came to park in the morning to go fishing. orchard and sheep nearby will delight children.

title: (33554) Tielve - CA-1
description: In front of the Tielve cemetery, on the other side of the road, there is room by the river for several vehicles, a flat place and abundant grass. Camping forbidden

title: (33591) Garaña - 72A Lugar Garaña
description: Perfect parking to visit the buffoons of Pría and the beach of Guadamía. 1.5km from there.

title: (33579) Panes -
description: Parking next to the Panes football field, 50 m from the La Brañona recreational area and next to the Deva river path.

title: (33579) - 2 Travesía de Panes
description: Panes motorhome area, with drain and water filling. Nice view on the mountain.

title: (33570) Panes - Calle Río Deva
description: Parking on the edge of the village of Panes. Well located, nice view of green area and mountains. Possibility of canoeing.

title: (33599) San Esteban - 12A Aldea San Esteban
description: Perfect place to camper. Day and night. Charming village for hiking. A lot of shade and water in the village. Space for 4 vans. Beautiful views.

title: (33570) Panes - 201 Calle Mayor
description: Water fountain/tap in town, enough clearance underneath to fit a decent sized container. alternative is the fuel station in town. there is a tap out front

title: (33570) Panes - 210C Lugar Panes
description: Access to hot showers in the Municipal Pavilion

name: Camping Picos de Europa
title: (33556) Camping Picos de Europa
description: Avín, 12 Barrio Avín. Camping Picos de Europa, great campsite very clean and very quiet crossed by a river.

title: (33579) Cuñaba - Unnamed Road
description:
Small spot with a beautiful view on the way to the town Cuñaba. Very steep but paved road with narrow turns up to this spot. NOT suitable for motorhomes, only small vans. Almost no traffic since the road only leads to a tiny village. 
Amazing views and a picnic table.
No trash cans so please clean up after yourselves and don't leave toilet paper, etc ..
no 4G

title: (33591) Playa de Guadamia - 56 Calle Llames
description: Newly landscaped car park near Bufones de Pria and Guadamia beach. No service. Ideal. Slightly sloping.

title: (33556) Avín - 53 Lugar Pedroso
description: Water source, it does not indicate potable or non-potable, we fill the tank for the shower and wash dishes together with two more vans, we all fit well. The faucet has a hose adapter.

title: (33590) Colombres - 101 Lugar el Redondo
description: Parking for cars in the center of the town. Few AC parked.

title: (33590) - Camino Fimango Alfaro
description: Grass and earth parking. can help if the place before is full. nothing extraordinary, but calm.

title: (33556) Avín - s/n AS-114
description: Small car park but very quiet without other vehicles or people. A motorhome fits if there is no one. It is the parking lot of the Glacial fauna museum that is worth visiting.

title: (33568) Ribadesella - Cuerres
description: On one side of the road 4 vans fit, only one square is level, the others are not. If you catch the one in the center, you have a magnificent porch with magnificent views, about 200 meters you have another parking lot and a recreational area with picnic tables. No overnight.

title: (33568) Ribadesella - Unnamed Road
description: Guadamia recreational area. Incredible views, cove a few meters with a bar. Very quiet area For motorhome a little just the way. (OVERNIGHT FORBIDDEN)

title: (33579) Suarías - 119A Aldea Suarias
description: parking

title: (33554) Tresviso - CA-1
description: Small parking lot by the road (not busy, a little further it is the end of the road!), In the mountains, tables and small fountain ...

title: (33554) Asturias - CA-1
description: Stop next to the road but wide enough. There is a stream and you can eat very calmly. I did not spend the night, camping prohibited

title: (33554) - 103 Aldea Camarmeña
description: Siding on the road closest to the Bulnes funicular, next to the hydroelectric power station. It is full all day, but if you arrive in the afternoon it is ideal to spend the night, very flat, with enough space for 5-6 large ACs. There are more sidings, but farther from the beginning of the Cares and Bulnes routes. You cannot sleep in the Funicular car park, and further on it is all very narrow and sloping.

title: (33579) Cimiano - 1 Aldea Cimiano
description: Beginning of the Argallu Forest route in Cimiano. flat meadow next to the hermitage. Access to the hermitage from Cimiano is short, but the roof is scratched with tree branches

title: (33590) Colombres - AS-344
description: Garden area, with picnic tables and shade. Wide paved esplanade to park. Without services On the side of the road.

title: (33554) -
description: Parking at the entrance to the Bulnes cable car, you can not stay overnight.

title: (33554) Camarmeña - 28A Aldea Camarmeña
description: 2 unregulated parking spaces for campers, next to the municipal cemetery, with beautiful views of the Naranjo de Bulnes. It is accessible by a small asphalt track with a steep and narrow slope, which starts from the last curve to the right of the main road to the town of Camarmeña.

title: (33554) - 27A Aldea Camarmeña
description: Explanada con espacio para pasar la noche 2 furgonetas o campers. En lo alto de un pueblo de montaña y con muy buenas vistas. La carretera de acceso de hormigón es algo estrecha pero muy corta.

title: (33590) Pimiango - RD-1
description: Three off-road parking spaces in the middle of the fields. Access not recommended with Camper. Do not follow Google directions, really difficult path with branches scratching the camper. Go through the village of Pimiango but without crossing it, go around it passing by the cemetery and then on a dirt road.

title: (33590) Pimiango - RD-1
description: At the parking lot there is a narrow passage on the right that leads to a meadow. the path was a bit overgrown but still accessible. the tire tracks are deep so it won't work with a low car. It goes to piece of meadow with flat ground. there were some straw bales for the cattle. view of the lighthouse and the sea.

title: (33554) Asturias - Ruta del Cares
description: Parking beside road. Start of walk to Cain and Bulnes. No notices forbidding parking. Amazing views. Little direct sunlight for solar. Can bathe in river near old bridge at start of walk to Bulnes. Toilet in Hostal Poncebos. Other hotels not keen to serve non residents currently.

title: (33556) Benia - 117A Lugar
description: Very large free parking, there is no written restriction for AC, bar and supermarket in front of the parking lot

title: (33556) Benia de Onís -
description: Small car park, just off the main access road as-114 and the entrance to the city of benia. Bus stop. Only day car park. Without services.

title: (33556) Benia de Onís - 273A Lugar Benia de Onis
title_short: (33556) Benia de Onís - 273A Lugar Benia de Onis
description: Parking of the town very close to the center, 3 minutes walk, next to the Church

title: (33556) Benia - 70A Lugar Villar
description: Recreational area with barbecues and fountains only during the day. Behind the Bearded Vulture Interpretation Center.

title: (33556) Asturias - 70A Lugar Villar
description: There is a well behind the visitor center/museum about the region's wildlife and nature. Parking is free.

title: (33579) La Hermida - 3 N-621
description: Beginning of the route to Tresviso

title: (33590) Bustio - 42A Calle Cruz
description: Battery parking with large space for long vehicles at the edge of the stream. it has a small green space with no additional services. has a drop in height

title: (33590) Bustio - 2 Calle Capilla
description: Drinking water point with free parking

title: (39560) Unquera - 23 Calle Remigio Noriega
description: In quiet urban parking to spend the night, next to bars and cafes, games for children.

title: (33556) - 97A Lugar Villar
description: Picnic area and a small square next to the road. It has a fountain with water we have only stopped to fill water and eat but possibly we could sleep

title: (39560) Unquera - 46 Calle San Felipe Neri
description: Public parking, asphalted, with very slight unevenness, near the center.

title: (39560) Unquera - 10 Calle Remigio Noriega
description: Laundry a bit cheaper than Ecolaundry. There are 2 washing machines of 10 kg and 2 others of 20 kg plus 3 dryers of 20 kg.

title: (39560) Unquera - 7 Calle Carretera General
description: The only place nearby where we found gas for the van.

title: (39560) Unquera - 6 Calle el Rincón
description: Laundry

title: (39560) - 27 Plaza Mercado
description: Park area and see Unquera, near the Sports Center.

name: Camping Las Arenas
title: (39560) Camping Las Arenas
description: Pechon, CA-380. Since this year a place for Kampaoh Glamping, the tents cover almost the whole place. The breathtaking sea view only for glamping guests. Mobile homes are only tolerated in the rearmost part of the road on an uneven terrace. Toilet and gray water disposal unreasonably far away.

title: (33579) Buelles - 123A Lugar Buelles
description: Parking at the edge of the road towards Potes; shading tables and benches, 4 or 5 places.

title: (33554) Sotres de Cabrales - CA-1
description: At the top of the pass, a spacious place next to an electric pole. With a view of the village of Sotres and the valley on the other side. Next to an old abandoned colony. Camping forbidden

title: (39584) Tresviso - CA-1
description: Magnificent view! Parking at the top of the pass between Sotres and Tresviso. In absolute calm (a road that passes very little because it does not go beyond Treviso). Only a few hikers and cyclists use the car park. The last kilometers are narrow and quite steep, but no problem for our 7.5m motorhome. Slight incline in the parking lot, with wineries we were very good. On the road, several other possible places, to choose from according to the desired view! Prohibition sign at the entrance to the car park.

title: (33568) Ribadesella - 1 Calle Ablanos
description: Petrol station with emptying service. Attention no drinking water!

title: (39580) Diseminado Hermida - 4 Diseminado Hermida
description: Little viewpoint, place for about 3 vans. Steep and sharp entrance turn, not suitable for RVs. Flat and gravel. Epic views. Right by a road but very quiet.

title: (33554) Sotres - 108A Lugar Sotres
description: Public parking where overnight is allowed. Without services Good starting point for hiking and mountain routes in the Picos de Europa.

title: (39560) Unquera - 44 Calle Carretera General
description: Online parking on both sides of the road. Possibly noisy to spend the night. Active tourism companies nearby, and automatic laundries 10 mins walk.

title: (33568) Toriello -
description: Beautiful spot surrounded by mountains and cliffs with ocean from the other side.  4x4 is not necessary. We got here with MB Vito. Do not ruin this spot please, so we can keep it in future.

title: (33554) Sotres - 54 Lugar Sotres
description: City water to fill your gericane with water no drinking water inscription but you can boil it or shower, dishes etc.

title: (33554) Sotres -
description: You reach it by a sandy road crossing different municipalities, you can pass with a motorhome. Small place, with capacity for 4 campers, to leave while you do routes or go to visit the Arresedores.

title: (33579) Asturias - 101 Lugar Merodio
description: Car park of the church of the town of Merodio, very quiet, the flattest area is the one at the end. It has a tight curve to get to the middle of town, easy for Camper, difficult for AC. In addition, it has some swings.

title: (33554) Sotres - 15A Lugar Sotres
description: Going up the hill of Pandébano, on the same road, there are different spaces. We eat here, with a beautiful view and very quiet. Ideal to go up or down the road to see the Naranjo de Bulnes. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (39569) Prío - Barrio San Roque
description: Impressive beauty location with views of the Cantabria to book small vehicles like wesfalia and other 4x4 with roof tent, for big vehicle the passage is too narrow.

title: (33556) Bobia - 78A Lugar Bobia de Arriba
description: Parking next to the hermitage, paved but with unevenness, no problem sleeping. Very quiet and with beautiful views, possibility of walking to the lakes (3:30 am, 12km and 800 of unevenness)

title: (39594) - 1E Calle Pesues
description: Service station avia service station 24 hours a day until 00:00 (showers for all "not only truck drivers", restaurant and children's area, large parking lot ideal for spending the night

title: (39580) - CM-22/03
description: Parking next to the road on the way to Bejes from La Hermida, quite large in front of the Calabreru climbing area. Some cars pass by at night but very quiet place we were alone. Bejes is 7 minutes following the road by car. Good to spend the night, it seems that it is the parking to go to the climbing sector.

title: (39580) Bejes - Unnamed Road
description: Parking not level.  The place, however, is beautiful and quite quiet, it is located at the beginning of the park. in the morning passage of hikers and cars that presumably go to the mountain pastures. The night is super quiet. Maximum access allowed to vans.

title: (33568) Asturias - 23I Lugar Meluerda
description: Esplanade in the middle of the fields at the edge of a cliff. Agricultural track - 4x4 only, magic.

title: (39580) Bejes - 102 Calle Mayor
description: Parking for several walking routes. There is a bigger car park further up but far too tight and steep to try it

title: (39580) Bejes -
description: Flat pitch suitable for 2 Vans. Although on the road it remains a bit raised and there is no noise at night. Great overnight stop.

title: (39580) La Hermida - N-621 / 63 Barrio la Hermida
title_short: (39580) La Hermida - N-621 / 63 Barrio la Hermida
description: Quiet parking lot, with playground. Restaurant . Going to the neighborhood on the other side of the river, there is a fountain with a wire to fill with water. Next to the pedestrian bridge. Only vans up to 6m, otherwise you will not pass.

title: (39580) La Hermida - 89 Barrio la Hermida
description: Going to the neighborhood on the other side of the river, there is a fountain with a thread to fill. Next to the pedestrian walkway. Only vans up to 6m, otherwise you will not pass. ours is 5.5m and there was no excess.

title: (33556) Onís - 82A Lugar Bobia de Arriba
description: recreational area in disuse. tranquility, animal cowbells and little else. If you come from below, it is preferable to continue to the hermitage and turn around to enter from the front if you drive AC or high volume. narrow but good access. medium vans no problem.
